hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Freestanding Key: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that you must read the names of "Special Deal" items in shops carefully.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Map#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Saria's House#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Minuet of Forest#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Deku Stick Capacity#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of time.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Did you know that Dark Link's max health is equal to @'s max health?

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #1# major item.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that Barinade, Volvagia and Twinrova hard require the Boomerang, Megaton Hammer and Mirror Shield, respectively?

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Compass# and #Saria's Song#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Minuet of Forest#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.
